briefdescription.para: Comprehensive data and event logging system for temperature monitoring.

detaileddescription.para:
Claude Code Session 20250720
2025-07-20
This file provides a complete logging solution including measurement data logging, event logging, and alarm state logging with CSV format and file management.

listitem.para: FS.h and SD.h for file system operations
ESP32 with SD card or LittleFS support
